column3: Oh, I can see your name badge.

Plus, it's kind of the norm for us to just, talk to people.
Without using their names, I mean.
I dunno. I guess we usually don't talk in large groups?
When do I get to fight another monster?
What? That's what you're supposed to train me to do, right?
Not only that, but yes you do need to help me fight.
Don't worry, it's not too hard.
So, what are you up for now?
